verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I can't get enough
No I can't get enough
Of Your amazing love
I can't get enough

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I can't walk away
No I can't walk away
For I have seen Your face
And I can't walk away

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And I just wanna be where You are
I just wanna be near Your heart
There is nothing like Your love x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Holy Holy
Holy Holy
Holy Holy
Jesus I love You
Jesus I love You
